page.title: 05Housing
page.content: There are a number of traditional farm houses, some of them still worked as farms, but some have had the land sold off and are now private houses. In addition there are small cottages which were originally built for farm workers. Many have been extended and modernised in recent years and now command a very high price. Some recent building has taken place and these properties tend to be large executive houses and bungalows. At the south east edge of the area is a large modern private housing development called Delamere Park, which has its own swimming pool and sports club open only to residents. Sadly, some of the young people who were born in the area are unable to afford the high price of the houses and have had to move away.
